briefdescription.para: Names of the supported alignments in the case of a view plugin.
Supported Qt alignment flags in the case of a view plugin.
Trigger action that displays the plugin description.
Hides the view plugin overlay toolbar widget.
Determines the view plugin overlay alignment.
Trigger action that moves the view plugin overlay to the top-left of the widget.
Trigger action that moves the view plugin overlay to the top-right of the widget.
Trigger action that moves the view plugin overlay to the bottom-left of the widget.
Trigger action that moves the view plugin overlay to the bottom-right of the widget.
Construct with pointer to parent object and title.
Initialize with pointer to plugin and parent object.
Get the context menu for the action.
Get the context menu for the alignment.

simplesect.para: Pointer to plugin overlay widget (maybe nullptr)

briefdescription.para: Get view plugin overlay alignment as a Qt flag.
Set view plugin overlay alignment to alignment.
Get whether the plugin has help information or not.

simplesect.para: Boolean determining whether the plugin has help information or not
